features: [Protect Your Privacy] Our Webcam Cover Slide efficiently protects your privacy and prevents unwanted hacking attacks. It also protects your webcam from dirt and dust.
[Extremely Thin And Durable] Measuring only 0. 028 inches in thickness, you won't even notice it adheres and it will not interfere with the closing or opening the lid of your laptop.

[Fits On Most Devices] Compatible with MacBook Pro, MacBook Air, Mac, laptops, Microsoft Surface, iPad, Android tablet, PC, computer, all-in-one desktop, iPhone and other smart phone. It does not interfere with webcam usage or web signal and will not damage your device in any way.

[Easy To Use] Simply align to your webcam, attach and press firmly for 15 seconds for a strong. The strong gel provides a durable and reliable connection between your devices and webcam cover. Also, the adhesive can be easily applied and removed from the device without leaving any traces.
[What you get] 3 X Pink+Blue+Green Webcam Covers, installation guide, and our friendly customer service.
body.description: Simple to use, clean minimalist design. Ultra-Thin, It measures only 0.02 inches in thickness which means it will not interfere with the closing of your laptop lid, perfectly combine with your devices. Installation - Use a dry cloth to clean the surface of your devices; - Remove the tape behind; - Align the hole on the cover over the camera lens and press about 10 seconds, which helps the adhesive be more durable; - Slide the cover to open and close your webcam camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for larger camera holes
reviews.reviewText: My work laptop has a large camera whole, and a tall border around the screen. I tried a few covers, and none were large enough. This cover is perfect - it allows the entire camera to show, without covering the edges. The round camera hole is definitely smart. If your laptop/monitor camera is large, try this cover!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tiny, But Terrific!!!
reviews.reviewText: After using a small strip of plastic tape to block my laptop's camera for years, I decided to try these. When closed, the camera display shows nothing. When open, the picture is perfectly displayed. The cover slides easily, but open or closed, it stays put. Now, when installing the cover, I did need to be very careful about framing the camera lens, but overall I found installation quite easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Virtual Work!
reviews.reviewText: A bit big for the area where the camera is, but it is STURDY! I constantly take my laptop carelessly to and from work in my backpack and the cover has not budged at all. Even if it did, there are 2 more in the pack! It is super handy now for working virtually as well because I no longer worry I'll join a meeting with my camera on accidentally. I also have a fear of the camera randomly turning on during these things (even though it won't happen) so it has cleared this fear for me! Even if I lose it or the whole pack I'd buy them again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little security device
reviews.reviewText: Don't let people tell you that your laptop cameras can't be turned on remotely and without you knowing. That is very much not true.If you are like me and value your privacy covering cameras is something I am very well attentive to. These thin little devices securely mount to your laptop camera or your cell phone camera. It covers very close to those tiny little lenses, but slides open and out of the way.I placed a picture of them so you can see the actual size compared to a normal desktop web cam. They are too small for the desktop web cam, but fit nicely on a laptop or cell phone.Great little security addition for the price. I will be buying more and I knock these around and eventually fall off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Setup, good product
reviews.reviewText: I like about this product is that the cover fits in its spot. I have a surface pro 7 and it fit perfectly. The only thing that is also covering is the white light, but that doesn't bother the camera. It indicates that the camera is on. I set it up where you would have to slide it to the left to close it because if I set it up to slide it the right then its going to cover the red light and then my tablet won't recognize me if I'm there or not. Easy to install. It kind of moves a little bit. It doesn't have that strong glue on it, but once its on its pretty much stays there. They are also really thin which is neat too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Trust me, buy this!
reviews.reviewText: I’m one of those who never leaves a review but this deserves one. I bought this for my new MacBook m1 after reading horror stories how other products cracked/broke MacBooks (particularly) because of the stickiness on them and not being able to be removed, and I have to say I am so happy I went with this one! I read reviews how they’re not super sticky and are thin, but they are everything I wanted. They’re not to a point where I feel like I can wipe them off but they are sticky enough where I feel comfortable keeping it on until I want to change colors without a ton of force. They’re also thin enough to comfortably close my computer (the photo may look different but I also have a case on my computer). And no, they’re not see-through.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for its price
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for webcam covers and came across these for a good price, as a pack of 3. They’re pretty flimsy in person, and not super thick, but they do do the trick of covering the camera. When it’s on, some light does come through (since I have the light pink color), but I would suspect this wouldn’t be the case with a dark color, and regardless you still can’t see anything through. Pleased!
